quotes.quote: Only an artist can interpret the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Novalis

quotes.quote: The aim of education is the knowledge, not of facts, but of values.
quotes.author: William Inge

quotes.quote: Who loves a garden loves a greenhouse too.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: Words may be false and full of art; Sighs are the natural language of the heart.
quotes.author: Thomas Shadwell

quotes.quote: To see things in the seed, that is genius.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu
